Package hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy.Discussion
      • hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Submission
    public class Post
extends Discussion
    COMPOSITE DESIGN PATTERN: Composite piece. Posts are the center of discussions on Forums. Each post belongs to a specified forum and should be related to that forum's topic. To create a post, go to the "Add to the conversation!" section in the desired forum and submit a title and a text body. The original poster, the forum moderator, and the site admins have the privilege to delete a post. To delete a post, go to "Delete Post" section in the forum the post is in and submit the title of the post. Posts can only be children of forums that are not the Frontpage, and only have comments as children.
